OrgName: Johnson & Johnson and its wholly owned subsidiary, Johnson & Johnson Services, Inc.
activities: Johnson & Johnson and its wholly owned subsidiary, Johnson & Johnson Services, Inc. (collectively, Johnson & Johnson), receive personal information in various forms relating to European personnel, including prospective and former employees, of Johnson & Johnson affiliates. Data transferred from the European Union to the United States are used to carry out the corporation's human resources functions and to support the human resources activities of the Johnson & Johnson family of companies.
contactoff1: Johnson & Johnson Health Care Compliance & Privacy
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities Panel and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
